title: Brain-Based Online Learning Design: Applying a Developmental Research Model

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary online learning experience and comprehension of fundamental social science concepts
context.additional_context: An immersive learning environment leveraging BYOD, where simulation/VR tools visualize brain cognition processes and deliver interactive learning experiences.

learning_goals: Learners can effectively design online learning materials by applying brain-based learning principles
Learners can analyze cognitive processes in simulation/VR environments and apply them to learning design strategies
Learners can iteratively improve their learning design prototypes through formative assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
